trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_SEQ_00<tab>Almet is strangely quiet.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Urianger.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_TODO_01<tab>Use the antidote to treat Runar's poison.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_TODO_02<tab>Offer Runar a second dose of the antidote.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_TODO_03<tab>Offer Runar a third dose of the antidote.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Urianger.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_THANCRED_000_000<tab>...
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_RYNE_000_005<tab>Why would she do such a thing?
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_010<tab>Oh, Y'shtola... Had we been but a few steps faster.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_CYMET_000_015<tab>We should have tried harder to repel them.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Almet. Please tell me you know if that hole might lead out into the woods somewhere.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_ALMET_000_021<tab>Were there another means of exiting the temple, there is no question that we would know of it.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_ALMET_000_022<tab>But I fear that is of little consequence, for we have tried to mark the depth of the pit. And failed.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_ALMET_000_023<tab>To fall from such a height...
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_024<tab>Sister! I come bearing news!
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_025<tab>The Eulmoran soldiers and the Children have fled Yx'Maja.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_026<tab>They abandoned Slitherbough as well, though they yet remain in the swamps near Lakeland.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_027<tab>Unfortunately, a number of the Blessed were poisoned while fending off the soldiers.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_028<tab>One we believe to be of their order was found lost in Yx'Maja, feverish and badly wounded.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_029<tab>He was taken to Fanow for treatment, but I fear there is little we can do for him.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_UIMET_000_030<tab>He and the other Blessed will not last long without an antidote.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_THANCRED_000_031<tab>Then we must act quickly. If you've a spare vial, Minfilia and I can deliver it to the Blessed at Slitherbough.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_THANCRED_000_032<tab>You and Urianger should return to Fanow and tend to the wounded villager there.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_RYNE_100_032<tab>What about Y'shtola...?
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_THANCRED_000_033<tab>I know it seems callous of us to leave, but she leapt into that hole for a reason.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_THANCRED_100_033<tab>We have to save the Blessed. Whatever it takes.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_RYNE_110_033<tab>All right.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_ALMET_000_034<tab>My sisters and I will remain here. We must be certain no soldiers are still lurking about.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_035<tab>Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let not Y'shtola's sacrifice be in vain.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_036<tab>To Fanow.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_RUNAR_000_040<tab><groan>
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_050<tab>Heavens forfend. Runar...
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_051<tab>'Twas he who forestalled the Eulmorans' procession. And in so doing, afforded thee time to traverse the temple.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_052<tab>Quickly, the antidote.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_060<tab>Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I fear he hath precious little time.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_RUNAR_000_070<tab><groan>
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Runar still appears visibly pained. Perhaps he requires another dose of medicine.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>The medicine seems to take effect as the color slowly creeps back to his cheeks.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_RUNAR_000_095<tab>Master...Matoya...
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_100<tab>It would appear the worst hath passed, though his wounds yet want for mending.
TEXT_LUCKMC117_03338_URIANGER_000_101<tab>I shall minister to him forthwith.
